title: BUILDING FUTURES logo
content:
Hi friends

Please help me id the font used for BUILDING FUTURES logo

[http://www.provplan.org/matriarch/images/uploads/buildingfutures\_logoSm....](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213024/http:/www.provplan.org/matriarch/images/uploads/buildingfutures_logoSm.jpg "http://www.provplan.org/matriarch/images/uploads/buildingfutures\_logoSm.jpg")

Thanks

Miguel

 [‹ Supra Footwear ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213024/http:/typophile.com/node/44351 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hi, I'm looking for a typeface similar to the one in the picture ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213024/http:/typophile.com/node/44374 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernando

comments.content: It looks like a version of a condensed Helvetica, Swiss or Akzidenz-Grotesk Alt. The S, R and G a throwing me off as to which one specifically. Which might mean that the text might actually be [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213024/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed).

I think “BUILDING” is a squooshed Helvetica Bold, and “FUTURES” is Univers 59, possibly squooshed a little.

- Lex
